recommendations: Swapnil Kosale “During Abhishek's two-month internship at GEP, I had the opportunity to collaborate with him. Throughout his time with us, he has shown exceptional skills in both managerial and technical aspects. The integration of AI and machine learning in his supply chain project not only yielded outstanding outcomes for our client but also showcased his inventive methodology. Abhishek's proficiency in automation and dedication to operational efficiency make him an outstanding candidate for demanding assignments. In addition to his professional expertise, his fervor for social concerns brings an admirable aspect to his personality. I highly endorse Abhishek for his significant contributions and unwavering commitment to achieving greatness.”

Navin Agrawal “Abhishek worked closely with me for nearly two years, and I must say that he is an exceptional talent. He possesses a unique combination of aggressiveness in finding business solutions and a calm demeanor when it comes to making critical decisions. Abhishek's problem-solving abilities shine through as he successfully tackled a wide range of challenges, from ensuring reactor availability to optimizing OEE and overseeing machine commissioning. Within just two years, he led over 30 kaizen initiatives and spearheaded several impactful Six Sigma projects, all while effectively managing plant maintenance tasks. Abhishek's remarkable skill in manpower management and ability to handle stress makes him an invaluable asset to any team. I wholeheartedly recommend Abhishek for his future endeavors and anticipate him exceeding even the highest expectations.”
